message.body: Thx!
Heya! Any chance I could borrow yr flute/take a few lessons from you for beans beans beans? I can pay in beer/snax/grass?
It's actually Corey's flute but I'd be happy to give you lessons if it's cool with him. Start blowing into beer bottles now!
Awesome, will do! What days work for you for lessons?
Mondays I have a 730 and could do before or we could meet before upholstery Tuesdays
I could do Tuesday! I'm off at 3 so any time after that
Wanna flute today around 5?
Sounds great
Awesome!
Actually it looks more like 5:15 if that's cool
Sounds good
K, I hafta be at suburban station at 6, so we'll have a short intro lesson then :-)
Here
Happiest of birthdays lady!!
Thanks! Im surprisingly spending it with Ms black
Aw, give her a squdge for me!
Eta? There's a show I promised to go to at 8, but if we meet before/after that'd be grand, it's not far from here
Mustache ride! (ride with yr mustache!)
Balls! I was riding with my mustache all day and forgot to drop it off. I'm going to mantua right now but can drop it off after I'm done
Ok, j will be home around 4:30, I'll be back after ten. Thx so much!
K. Moustache is hairy mouse thing next to phone books downstairs
Ha, awesome, thx!
(01/02) So are we on for movie night tonight? If so can we make popcorn at johns house, I'll bring some whiskey and mulling spices, And maybe someone
(02/02) can grab some apple cider?
Yes! I can bring some cider.
Im still at rehearsal :'(
Kate and I are bemoaning our lack of potatoes!
We miss you guys too!
We're listening to careless whispers on record right now
Yup. 930 right?
Hey I'm going to second mile for a half off sale. Do you need anything? Props costumes et cetera
(01/02) Hey Kenny, did you want me to play with you tonight? I definitely feel comfortable jumping in on Jamon and could fudge the chain if need be. I
(02/02) f not, I will still be an enthusiastic audience member.
Oh! Um! Maybe? I feel like I should ask the group. But I am going to say yes if you want to, but no worries if not!
Probably around 10...
Hey, we're headed to fiume in a little bit. It's pretty gross out but if you feel like coming out we'll be there
Sounds like a good time!
Yea, too gross, plus I got wrecked at the Balkan wpo thing last night :-( thx tho! have fun!
Yes!
See ya soon then!
Thanks Kennedy. That means a lot to me
(01/02) I'm done with the clans on Sunday. Could definitely use a drink after! Are you going to the body lautrec thing? Maybe we could hit a happy hou
(02/02) r beforehand?
Woot! I'm going to stuff my face with cheese!
You have to let your partner look like a man every once in awhile!
Nooooo, never!!!!
Also, I am lame for not texting you last night. I owe you a pot of Mac n cheese
Sweet! And no prob. Had a great time with Carol
Oh good! You got to see the mixson! But fur serious, I get you drink soon. You like pattern is movement? They are screening their new album with free pizza tonight!
Cool! Where and when?
At phila moca, 7:30!
Is it still going on? Just picked my car up.
Yes! Just about to start
No more pizza tho :-(
Hey ladies, you want to make some cake? I'll be back home in about 40 minutes and may need a half hour nap. What are you guys doing?
Perfect! So around 5 eh? I'm gonna look at a car out west.
Sounds great!
Avoid the flames!
Runnin late of course...maybe more like 6 :-/ that ok?
Sounds good!
